description.en:
"We're the ones doing all the brain and leg work…" But who exactly are they, those brave soldiers of the invisible front?  
  
This book introduces DOLLS fans to the ordinary staff of the SEF Intelligence department and sheds some light on their personalities. You’ll learn about interpersonal issues existing inside the intel squads and feel the hardships of being a mere supporting character.

biography.en: Professional duo of [Saki Otoh](https://mangadex.org/author/db3a8ef5-4764-49ef-9078-4730df839639) and [Nakamura Tomomi](https://mangadex.org/author/d314a18e-36df-41a4-97a3-abbe648c142f). Saki Otoh writes, designs, & storyboards while Nakamura Tomomi illustrates. For doujinshis, their circle is [acute girls](https://mangadex.org/author/df565389-6e68-4294-9d7b-d67f36b82b43).
